title: Always ban Yasuo, no matter the consequences

> [{quoted}](name=GoqK,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1BvpZ59A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-07-12T01:18:32.418+0000)
>
> I logged in just to downvote this, seriously growup.

Do I smell a Yasuo main?

Oh please dead baby jokes have been a staple of shock humor for decades. Next thing you'll say you actually take the aristocrats jokes seriously.

I swear people nowadays have no chill.

Downvotes are meant to be used for content that adds nothing to the discussion.

"Logged in just to downvote." would possibly be the best example of a comment that should be downvoted indiscriminately.

Because this is Memes & Games where people love to berate and make fun of each other with memes or otherwise.

Double so if the person in question is salty as fuck.

Downvote and "Downvote"

What your taking as downvote is anything you find as un-tasteful, or something you don't like per-see 

"Downvotes" on the other hand should be used to hide a comment that is blatantly rude until it can be removed or edited. 

More often you see the first one. Differing opinions and bias work more then the proper usage.

Upvotes are just for fun tho.
If you want to see people with no chill, look at all of history. The human race loves having no chill, it's our thing.

You know what's the difference between lamborghini and a bunch of dead babies?


One of those isn't in my garage {{champion:17}}
or it could be a joke?

No just large portion of jokes and humour is based on stereotypes. It has nothing to do with League, nothing to do with low elo and nothing to do with your salt. There are jokes about blonde women, policemen, liberals, rightwingers, gays, black people, europeans, americans, africans, chinese, weabos. It takes brain to recognize the line between stereotype pushing its way into laws and one pushing its way to jokes.
Actually, that's exactly what a yasuo does.

1 - Your joke is really bad, like parents that dumpster their babies ? really ?
2 - An other x987627427 yasuo memes, it have been one year since we all see theses jokes, and im 100% sure someone did the same joke as you but with differents picture
3 - saying Loging in just to downvote means, i enjoy all the memes in this boards because they are something new and don't take my interest in downvoting or upvoting them because im lazy, So you joke is so bad that i just made the effort to log in just to say my opnion

It's a joke growup

considering yas is abused in low elo and rarely seen in mid elo , personally i dont mind seeing yasuo players but this meme is funny :)

Yeah but I am in low-elo

http://i.imgur.com/hbVaz12.gif[/img]

ahahahah , the trick to getting out of low elo - watch streamers , learn their strats and play them.  it worked for me , just find someone on twitch who you like and bam , your plat out of nowhere. TRUST ME it works

nah. the trick is to do some research on the formulas in the game that are used to determine armor and magic resist. then you just need to find a champion you're comfortable with/ can relate to. then you read your abilities and figure out how much true damage you can do at any given moment based on your build. click your opponent so they show up in the top left and look at their hp and their resistances and do the math. poke until they're in kill zone then all in. it's that simple.

I don't like assassins in general. Mainly just: 

{{champion:238}}. {{champion:105}}. {{champion:157}}. {{champion:55}}. {{champion:84}}.

But, I found the cure! 

{{champion:127}}. So much fun to ult when fizz's fish latches onto you. Ah, and when Zed ults, or Kat tries to ult, and oh yea, Yasuo getting all dive-y on me, but I ult him under tower with my ring of frost. Life feels good when you play Lissandra.
play raka mid. It's still fun to play against assassins that rely heavily on abilities (Especially if you're in the lower skill levels like me)

Is it Randomphilia? I don't remember this episode...

It would be more appropriate if yasuo was a pair of scissors and the yasuo player the baby.
The baby cries he wants to play with the scissors but his mother doesn't want him to, so the kid throws a tantrum threatening her of feeding or locking in disco nunu, so she agrees for him to play with the scissors but the kid ends up cutting himself a finger, then he slaps his mother with the blood dripping hand and calls her a noob and says that the only reason why he cut himself is because she wouldn't gank him enough, despite his mother playing a cc-less jungler and yasuo being against an ungankable champion such as zed.
